      • getConnectionHost

        public String getConnectionHost()
        Get the Host the Session should connect to.
        For clients this is the hostname of the server.
        For servers this is the interface they have to listen to (default should be 0.0.0.0, i.e: all).
        Specified by:
        getConnectionHost in interface Configuration
        Returns:
        the Hostname.

      • getConnectionPort

        public int getConnectionPort()
        Get the port to connect to.
        For clients this is the port which the server is set up at.
        for servers this is the port which they have to listen to.
        Specified by:
        getConnectionPort in interface Configuration
        Returns:
        the port.
